name.en: Independent Study: The psychology of attention
name.ch: 獨立研究：注意力的心理學

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 介紹實驗心理學研究工具與方法對於注意力之研究，培養學生探討並了解注意力及其神經機制在心理學上應用，透過課程的討論及交流，提升對於該議題的了解與執行研究的能力。
goal.en: “I hope students can learn how to do the neuroscience and exprimental psychology study on visual attention, eg. paper collection and review, expriment progaming writing, expriment running, data analysis and presentation etc.“

outline.ch: 本課程將介紹和討論視覺注意力的當前研究趨勢。由於授課期間需由學生報告相關的原創研究論文，因此學生在修課之前需具備實驗心理學以及認知神經科學的學問背景知識。
outline.en:
“Introducing and discussion current theories of visual attention and their impacts.
I will ask students to read and present related original articles, it is better that all students should get ready the background knowledge of exprimental psychology and cognitive neuroscience first.“
